name: Marechaussee Hunter
description:
After the character takes DMG or is healed: Based on the number of times this effect has been triggered this Round, the effects will be different.
First Trigger: Create 1 Elemental Die of this character's Elemental Type.
Second Trigger: Draw 1 card.
Fourth Trigger: Create 1 Elemental Die of this character's Elemental Type.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character takes DMG or is healed:</color> Based on the number of times this effect has been triggered this Round, the effects will be different.

descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character takes DMG or is healed:</color> Based on the number of times this effect has been triggered this Round, the effects will be different.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>First Trigger:</color> Create 1 Elemental Die of this character's Elemental Type.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Second Trigger:</color> Draw 1 card.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Fourth Trigger:</color> Create 1 Elemental Die of this character's Elemental Type.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext:
"'Pursue the phantoms in the dark, expel them all, and hunt them down.'
Such is the origin of the name 'Marechaussee Hunter,'
Credited to one Cassiodor, who would be elevated to the revered title of 'Golden Hunter,'
But who saw the name as a humiliation."
